targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(value) FROM solar.bess2_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter("time") AND metric LIKE 'RAW-BESS_PROFIT'
SELECT SUM(value) FROM solar.bess2_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter("time") AND metric LIKE 'RAW-OVERALL_PROFIT'

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-ELS_SLR_ELSP12_POWER_PEAK_SP_LGC'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-ELS_SLR_ENG_IMPORT_COST_SP'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-ELS_SLR_ENG_EXPORT_FEE_SP'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-ELS_SLR_ENG_BATT_COST_SP'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'reward'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'reward'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'optimization_satisfaction'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'optimization_satisfaction'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-BESS_PROFIT'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-BESS_PROFIT'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-CHARGING_FROM_GRID_COST'
OR metric like 'RAW-CHARGING_FROM_SOLAR_COST'
OR metric like 'RAW-DISCHARGED_POOL_PRICE_REVENUE'
OR metric like 'RAW-DISCHARGED_GRID_PRICE_REVENUE'
OR metric like 'RAW-BESS_DEGRADATION_COST'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-CHARGING_FROM_GRID_COST'
OR metric like 'RAW-CHARGING_FROM_SOLAR_COST'
OR metric like 'RAW-DISCHARGED_POOL_PRICE_REVENUE'
OR metric like 'RAW-DISCHARGED_GRID_PRICE_REVENUE'
OR metric like 'RAW-BESS_DEGRADATION_COST'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-BESS_DEGRADATION_PROFIT'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-BESS_DEGRADATION_PROFIT'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-OVERALL_PROFIT'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'RAW-OVERALL_PROFIT'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'zones-ELS_SLR_ELSP12_ENG_IN_TOT%'
AND metric NOT LIKE '%_violation'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'zones-ELS_SLR_ELSP12_ENG_IN_TOT_violation'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric 
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'zones-P12_MAJORITY_ON_SITE_CONSUMPTION_CONSTRAINT%'
AND metric NOT LIKE '%_violation'
OR metric LIKE 'RAW-ELS_SLR_ELSP12_MAJORITY_LGC'
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT value, time, metric
FROM solar.bess2_metrics 
WHERE $__timeFilter("time") 
AND metric LIKE 'zones-P12_MAJORITY_ON_SITE_CONSUMPTION_CONSTRAINT_violation'
ORDER BY "time"
